fields.label: Video url
fields.message: If you put a youtube video url in the caption field the video will be displayed on the site

fields.name: import_id

fields.label: Slide images

fields.instructions: Select the images to be displayed in the slide

fields.label: Should list posts in compact mode?
fields.name: compact_list_posts

fields.label: Route
fields.name: polyline
fields.instructions: Generate a route on https://openrouteservie.org/dev/#/api-docs/ in Directions service and paste here the geometry attribute of the response.

fields.label: Not searchable
fields.name: not_searchable
fields.instructions: The content will not be listed in search results or auto related listing

fields.label: Open in new page
fields.name: target_blank
fields.instructions: Open the content in a new page when clicked in the list mode

fields.label: Resizable
fields.name: resizable
fields.instructions: Allow the post box to be resized

fields.label: No link
fields.name: no_link
fields.instructions: No link to single will be added when listing this content

fields.label: Custom link
fields.name: custom_link
fields.instructions: An custom/external URL/link for the content
